summary: This is a Washington Post newsletter email from June 16, 2021, containing a summary of a news article. The article reports that British police will review new allegations that Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell committed offenses in Britain, and mentions Prince Andrew's connection to the scandal.

events.title: Channel 4 News investigation airs
events.description: A Channel 4 News investigation aired, making allegations that Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell sexually abused, trafficked, and groomed multiple women and girls in Britain over many years.

events.title: British police announce review
events.description: Following the Channel 4 News investigation, British police (Metropolitan Police Service) announce they will review the allegations against Epstein and Maxwell in Britain.

keyFacts: British police announced they would review new allegations that Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell committed crimes, including sexual abuse, trafficking, and grooming, in Britain.
The allegations stemmed from a Channel 4 News investigation that aired on June 15, 2021, which claimed there were at least half a dozen victims, potentially 'much higher'.
The report prompted fresh calls for the Metropolitan Police Service to fully investigate the Epstein scandal in Britain.
The scandal is noted for having thrust Britain's Prince Andrew into the spotlight due to his ties to Jeffrey Epstein.
